text: North Dallas Forty is a 1979 American comedy-drama movie directed by Ted Kotcheff and was based on the 1973 novel of the same name by Peter Gent. It stars Nick Nolte, Mac Davis, Dayle Haddon, Bo Svenson, G. D. Spradlin, Dabney Coleman and Charles Durning and was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * Category:1979 comedy-drama movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Ted Kotcheff Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies set in Texas Category:1970s English-language movies Category:American sports comedy movies Category:1970s sports movies
title: North Dallas Forty
